reviews.review: sinceramente, o jogo em si é divertido mas é enjoativo num geral, a comunidade é incrível de tão ''boa'', o game é bem repetitivo e fica sem graça a partir de 500 horas, a jogabilidade é aceitável tirando os bugs, mas são raros, as vezes tem um ou outro, recomendo apenas se for uma promoção, se você comprou o game, parabéns, divirta-se perdendo horas da sua vida procrastinando c:
bullying killer game

Dead by Daylight is a fun game... But only with friends. The matchmaking is really broken. It can reward toxic behavior.
One thing that is great about this game is the amount of crossovers. It is fun to run around as Ash Williams, Bill Overbeck, Jonathan Byers, etc. I'd love to see more crossovers in the future too.
Dead by Daylight is a good but extremely broken game.

I dead ass want a refund for demegorgon. This game is not whatever price they tell you, you have to pay for every character individually. And the demegorgon is 100% of the time a negative experience where you don't have fun. But also it costs you money. Money to have a bad time. Money to be upsetty spaghetti. Money to be not a killer, but to be fucking disrespected for 10 minutes straight.

Just be aware you're going to spend more than the price of the game, and sometimes youll buy something that makes your mood bad every time you "play" it.

This game is surprisingly fun whether you're the valiant survivor fighting for your life or the vicious killer making sacrifices for the Entity. Every character is unique and has their own gameplay which makes this game more exciting. Oh and also, the developers keep pumping out new content as if this game just came out.
A really good game to play with your friends and begin to hate your life.
клевая, но не на долго .

Started playing this game early October and I've already fallen in love. The makes me mad, happy, sad, and numb all at the same time. I find myself lunging with the killer and moving my head while playing as a survivor. The game really pulls me in. With all its flaws I still enjoy playing it. 

There are multiple flaws though. However, with any game that has some sort of perk system and a perk system that goes against it self as that, killers and survivors, there will be problems. Some perks will to too strong, many will not be touched, and some are just average. Balancing a game like this is difficult and I can completely understand the time it takes to fix and re-balance specific perks.

Matchmaking is a pain and constantly causes me suffering. Whether its two rank 2 survivors up against a rank 18 killer or vice versa, the game becomes a toxic mix of vomit and bile.

In summation, I love this game, I hate this game, I wish I could stop playing but I never will.
Fun game if you are good can get hard if you dont know how to loop. but overall fun in customs, and really good cosmetics and chrecters

Es un juego muy divertido con mucho espacio para aprender pero no tanto para ser creativo. La mayoría de las builds que te encontrás tienen 2 o 3 perks en común y sobre todo en rangos altos nadie sale del meta.  Habiendo dicho esto, igualmente es muy adictivo el proceso de subir de nivel a cada personaje para adquirir mas habilidades y poder variar tu forma de juego, al mismo tiempo que aprendés nuevas tácticas y formas de cazar supervivientes o marear al asesino.

El mayor problema que tiene, en mi opinión, es la inclusión de características que van en contra de la idea principal del juego y el desafío que propone. Los supervivientes tienen la posibilidad de utilizar una llave que les permite escapar cuando queden 2 generadores o menos en la partida y hasta hace poco los asesinos podían usar una ofrenda para matar al instante a cualquier sobreviviente que haya sido colgado una vez. Al ser un juego en el que el uso de tu tiempo es muy importante y en el que en cada momento tenés que pensar cual es la mejor decisión para escapar o matar a los supervivientes en el menor tiempo posible, es increíble que haya objetos que te permitan cortar el juego tan bruscamente.

A pesar de que creo que hay DLCs que son indispensables por las habilidades que contienen como el de Halloween o Leatherface, no sentí una presión para comprarlos sacando esos casos del medio, de hecho, la mayoría de los personajes (Los que no son de IPs ajenas al juego) pueden comprarse con puntos que se ganan jugando.

Con todos los fallos que pueda llegar a tener, hay que reconocer también que los devs se preocupan por arreglar los bugs que van saliendo, a pesar de que eso a veces cause que otros errores aparezcan.

So where to begin, i currently only have 202.8 hours on pc but i started off on console and played it since it released and i will say that the game has definantly improved, they have made many changes and improvments to the game since released and i do really enjoy the game, even tho i complain about it half the time i play it, i def would recommend the game to people but explain that its going to take alot of getting used to. for me i play this game daily i may not be the best at it but i do enjoy it, the recent updates, the graphics changes and many more impressed me "pretty good job so far" ! and thats why i do think they deserve to be nominated for labor of love award, they are taking in account alot of things that the community has said, and yes i KNOW there is ALOT more that could be changed and needs to be fixed but i think they can only do so much at at time.

Данный продукт является невероятно противоречивым и неоднозначным. Несмотря на огромное количество минусов описанных в сотнях опубликованных отзывов, данный проект имеет огромную фанатскую базу и стабильный прирост новых игроков. Ввиду отсутствия серьезных конкурентов и риска потери большого процента аудитории, разработчики весьма пренебрежительно относятся ко многим очевидным проблемам игры, что по моему скромному мнению и является основной проблемой Dead by Dayligh.
